author: leobeltra
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds support for user-defined methods acting on the `SoAView`, mirroring the same concept introduced in [#47625](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47625) for the `View`. This PR should be merged before [#48629](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48629).

#### PR validation:

A new test has been added, and it passes.
title: Added custom methods for the SoA View
